snippet: The problem of what to do with the body of Tamerlan Tsarnaev, one of two suspects in the Boston Marathon bombing, was solved when a small cemetery agreed to take it.
abstract: Body of Tamerlan Tsarnaev, Boston Marathon bombing suspect, is buried at small Muslim cemetery in Doswell, Va.
lead_paragraph: The problem of what to do with the body of Tamerlan Tsarnaev, one of two suspects in the Boston Marathon bombing, was solved when a small cemetery agreed to take it.

headline.seo: Tamerlan Tsarnaev Buried in Virginia Cemetery
headline.main: Shunned Elsewhere, Body of Marathon Bombing Suspect Is Buried in Virginia Cemetery
headline.print_headline: Shunned Elsewhere, Body of Marathon Bombing Suspect Is Buried in Virginia Cemetery
